The seq/cat.hpp header defines macros for concatenating all elements in a seq.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/seq/cat.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_CAT
  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_CAT_S
